attributes.long-description:
A bundle of two fan favorite EA Sports arcade classics. The all-new NFL Blitz combines the arcade-style gameplay from the original with the deep, immersive game modes of today! Whether you’re battling your rival in a 7-on-7 grudge match or fighting your way through a season of the Blitz Gauntlet, Every Game Is a Two-Minute Drill! NBA JAM: On Fire Edition is everything you love about NBA JAM, dialed up to 11! Featuring bigger rosters, 30+ unlockable secret teams, Legendary Players, Monster Dunks, Heating Up, Online Arena, and so much more.

Compatible with PlayStation®3.
859MB minimum space required
1 - 4 Players
DUALSHOCK®3 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
Network Players: 2 - 4

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON www.ea.com OR 30 DAYS AFTER THE LAST DAY OF THE 2011 - 2012 NBA SEASON.'
attributes.name: NBA JAM: ON FIRE EDITION / NFL BLITZ - BUNDLE
